author: jmarino
msg: Support system services scoped to a composite as an extension point: split composite child tree into two halves, application components and system services. This involved removal system composite and autowire component specializations. Refactor and add test cases accordingly. Move SystemAtomicComponent to SPI for custom system type extensions

author: jdillon
msg: Update to use the latest Jexl 1.1

author: norman
msg: We should remember to run mvn ant after adding new depenedencies
